intro: Follow the dream of haven to reclaim your freedom.
description:
Face the path no one would walk. Believe in what was lost. Some truths are buried where only the high-hearted dare step.

“Legendary Tales: Map of Hope” is an adventure game in the Hidden Objects genre, with plenty of mini-games and puzzles, unforgettable characters, and complicated quests.

Lucia and her brother have spent years running and hiding from witches, with nowhere left to turn. But their old friend Skarlett brings news that dispels the looming despair: there may be a place where they can finally reunite with their own kind.

Unfortunately, Skarlett cannot join the journey. The risk of exposing herself among the witches is far too great. Lucia must walk this path alone.

Still, as ever, she and her brother won’t be truly alone. Along the way, they’ll find allies—some familiar, some unexpected—each helping them inch closer to that distant dream.

Will they finally find peace among their kindred?

- Prove that the legends are true
- Explore the magic world and its forgotten secrets
- Gather fascinating collections and find dozens of morphing objects
- Enjoy stunning locations and beautiful soundtracks
- Solve dozens of puzzles and test your skills in exciting mini-games
